data.title: Football League Table Calculator
data.statement:
You are given the results of football matches in a league. Calculate the final league table sorted by points (descending), then by goal difference (descending), then alphabetically by team name.
In football:

Win = 3 points
Draw = 1 point
Loss = 0 points
Goal difference = Goals scored - Goals conceded

testCases.title: Test 1
testCases.testIn:
4
Arsenal Chelsea 2 1
Liverpool ManCity 1 1
Arsenal Liverpool 3 0
Chelsea ManCity 0 2

testCases.title: Validator 1

3
Barcelona Real 1 2

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are given the results of football matches in a league. Calculate the final league table sorted by points (descending), then by goal difference (descending), then alphabetically by team name.
In football:

Win = 3 points
Draw = 1 point
Loss = 0 points
Goal difference = Goals scored - Goals conceded
Input
Line 1 : An integer n (number of matches)
Next n lines : Each match result in format TeamA TeamB ScoreA ScoreB
Output
For each team, output: TeamName Points GoalDifference
Teams should be sorted by:

Points (descending)
Goal difference (descending)
Team name (alphabetically)
Constraints
1 ≤ n ≤ 10
Team names contain only letters (no spaces)
0 ≤ ScoreA, ScoreB ≤ 10
Example
Input
4
Arsenal Chelsea 2 1
Liverpool ManCity 1 1
Arsenal Liverpool 3 0
Chelsea ManCity 0 2
Output
Arsenal 6 4
ManCity 4 2
Liverpool 1 -3
Chelsea 0 -3
